Lack of evidence: The expert's verdict highlights that there is no evidence in the public record to support the claim that Ben Carson said, "My mother raised me with no help from the government."
Carson: s interview: The expert points out that on the date mentioned in the meme (November 7, 2015), Carson did not talk about food stamps and public housing in an interview he gave to NBC's "Meet the Press." The interview focused on other topics, not the claim made in the meme.
Satirical nature of the meme: The expert reveals that an early version of the meme included the web address of a now-defunct Facebook page that described its content as political "satire and parody." This suggests that the meme was not intended to be taken seriously.
